**2022-10-20 / @rsc, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @andybons, @aclements**

**Accepted**

- **os/exec: add fields for managing termination signals and pipes** [#50436](https://go.dev/issue/50436)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **regexp: add ErrLarge error** [#56041](https://go.dev/issue/56041)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/exp/slices: add Replace** [#55358](https://go.dev/issue/55358)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/tools/go/ssa: generate function bodies for parameterized functions** [#54984](https://go.dev/issue/54984)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **crypto/cipher: detached mode AEAD Seal/Open** [#24990](https://go.dev/issue/24990)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **crypto: add crypto engines** [#33281](https://go.dev/issue/33281)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **hash: permit usage of encoding/binary package** [#55104](https://go.dev/issue/55104)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **net/http:  Enabling support for HTTP/2 ORIGIN Frames RFC 8336** [#55121](https://go.dev/issue/55121)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **all: add openbsd/riscv64 port** [#55999](https://go.dev/issue/55999)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **archive/tar, archive/zip: add ErrInsecurePath** [#55356](https://go.dev/issue/55356)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **cmd/vet: extend the loopclosure analysis to parallel subtests** [#55972](https://go.dev/issue/55972)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **crypto/rsa: allow hash.Hash for OAEP and MGF1 to be specified independently** [#19974](https://go.dev/issue/19974)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **net/http: add Transport.OnProxyConnectResponse** [#54299](https://go.dev/issue/54299)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **add static analysis to find deprecated reflect.{SliceHeader,StringHeader} that could be replaced by unsafe.{Slice,SliceData,String,StringData}** [#54989](https://go.dev/issue/54989)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
